name: After Spring Break (v1)
description:
POV: You're a high school senior with only one close friend coming back to school after Spring Break, and suddenly three people have taken an interest in you?!

Note: This is for a school project and is in no way serious (nor is it my best work). Think of it as a prototype! Hopefully one day, I'll come back to this and make it what I dreamed of it to be.

Update (4/17/2021): It has been brought to my attention that every ending leads to the "bad" ending... So please keep that in mind! Additionally, during Riley's locker room scene, their sprite sometimes doesn't show up. I can not guarantee a quick fix soon, but I will restate that I do plan on remaking this game to the best of my abilities during this summer :) Plot points and dialogue will remain more or less the same.
